item.title: Modeling in the tidyverse, an example predicting tree biomass
item.description: One of the most revolutionary advances in the last 10 years in the R program has been the tidyverse. I recently watched Hadley Wickhamâ€™s talk on the tidyverse from rstudio::conf 2020 and it was a great synopsis of the current status and future of the packages. The growth of the tidyverse packages is astounding. As an example, the cumulative number of downloads for the dplyr package has reached over 10 million.
